steps.title: Put the heat on medium to high heat.
steps.content: Put the heat on medium to high heat. Put the butter in the saucepan for it to melt.

steps.title: Pour the pasta noodles and seasoning package into the pan.
steps.content: Pour the pasta noodles and seasoning package into the pan.

steps.title: Pour, at a slow rate, the milk and water into the pan.
steps.content: Pour, at a slow rate, the milk and water into the pan. This is to avoid any splashing. Gently sprinkle and put the tuna into the pan.

steps.title: Mix and stir the ingredients together.
steps.content: Mix and stir the ingredients together. Let the tuna helper come to a boil.

steps.title: Lower the heat to "low" and cover the pan for 13 to 15 minutes.
steps.content: Lower the heat to "low" and cover the pan for 13 to 15 minutes. Stir on occasion.

steps.title: Turn off the heat and let the tuna helper cool down.
steps.content: Turn off the heat and let the tuna helper cool down. As it cools down, the sauce will thicken.

steps.title: Mix all ingredients in an ungreased 2-quart casserole.
steps.content: Mix all ingredients in an ungreased 2-quart casserole.

steps.title: Bake 35 minutes or until pasta is tender.
steps.content: Bake 35 minutes or until pasta is tender. Gently uncover and stir to thicken sauce.
